name: com.firedragongamestudio.simplewebrtc
description: Unity-based WebRTC wrapper that facilitates peer-to-peer audio, video, and data communication over WebRTC.

samples.description: WebRTC sample scenes to demonstrate functionality.
WebRTC sample scene to demonstrate functionality, while using Photon Fusion 2 for signaling. Make sure Photon Fusion 2 package is installed before importing this sample.

VisualScripting nodes, events, utils, models and sample graph to use SimpleWebRTC with VisualScripting. Make sure Unity VisualScripting package is installed before importing this sample. Make sure to regenerate the VisualScripting nodes in project settings after import.

Sample scene to show immersive video transmission from a 3D scene. The video stream is a 360° video, either monoscopic or stereo in an over-under or side-by-side layout. The sample scenes use materials and RenderTextures from the Runtime folder. Note that streaming a 360° video takes a considerable amout of rendering resources.
